data.text: @TeairaMariee Yesss, they are all over the place. No one knows who is doing what and no one can be trusted.  One episode, I saw #Tommy secretly taping #Teresi so #tommy is up to something.  Angela needs not to ask #tommy to kill anyone....she needs to find someone else to do ur dirty work.
@AnnKSherron True... there isn’t any evidence I just hate it it’s all so damn messy now there’s no way everyone comes out clean

@TeairaMariee Yeah, but where are the witnesses to really say #Ghost did it.  Teresi is also known for killings as well. Teresi word against #Ghost. The Prosecutors have to prove #Ghost did it and Teresi's testimony isn't reliable. If Teresi keeps talking he will be on #Ghost hit list.
